message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think you'll find it's a great deal for what it offers.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I could only do it for around $12,000.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $18,000 for you. I believe this product will exceed your expectations and be well worth the investment.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $18,000 is still a bit too steep for my budget.  Would you consider $14,000? That's the highest I can go.
